Posts.Content: I read very positeve testemonies on post operated hormon therapy, but nothing about before. This is a link to energy kit info. http://alternativecancer.us/ak.htm I am from Michigan, Detroit area. Nothing was don so far on me. I have to go for 2nd biopsy and first blood test next week. I start almost raw food diet, feel good and loosing pounds (.5-1.2 daily). I try to get alternative treatment help, but coundn't find a doctor. thanks, Lialia
Posts.Title: hormone therapy

Posts.Content: I was offered study for my BC. This is hormone drugs to shrink cancer. Drug are (one of three): Exemestane, Letorzol and Anasttrozole. I never take any drugs and have no expirience. Sombody can help? If somebody use energy test kit, please share experience. I am 59, postmeno, feel healthy - exept cancer. Thanks Lialia
Posts.Title: hormone therapy

Posts.Content: Thanks! this info very intresting Lialia
Posts.Title: hormone therapy

Posts.Content: I call very same clinic in Zion, IL about midnight three days ago. I got call back in 24 hours very nice call and very good conversation. Then, I was told all good and promising things.... After all, my insurance covers only 70% (clinic out of network). The facility is NOT working with BCBSH PPO MI. They want $125,000 (one hundred twenty five thousand) up front payment and additional same amount in reserve. I know, my health cost more, but I simple don't have this kind of money. So, ACS lost interest on me. No more calls. I call back, but they can't work with me. End of story. If somebody use energy test kit, please share experience. Lialia
